final_state.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Diana was found dead this morning.
You said: I'm shocked by Diana's sudden passing. Let's support each other during this difficult time. Let's also stay vigilant to ensure the killer isn't among us. #Support #Vigilance
Charlie: I agree, let's all come together during this tough time. But we must also remember that one of us is an mafioso. Let's keep an eye on each other. #Vigilance #Support #Suspicion
Bob: I agree with Alice and Charlie. Let's support each other during this difficult time. But we must also remember to stay vigilant and keep an eye on each other. #Support #Vigilance
Bob: Let's continue our discussion about staying vigilant and supporting each other during this difficult time. We should remain cautious and communicate openly to ensure everyone's safety....
You said: Let's not jump to conclusions and trust each other during this challenging time. We can work together to uncover the truth and ensure everyone's safety. #Trust #Teamwork #Unity

Charlie: Let's not forget that one of us is an mafioso. We need to remain vigilant to ensure everyone's safety. #Vigilance #Suspicion #MafiaGame
